cab.content: CONFIDENTIALluMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HER BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT7509) *thCOPY NOCABINETCONCLUSIONS of a Meeting of the Cabinetheld at 10 Downing Street onTUESDAY 12 JUNE 1979at 10. 30 amPRESENTThe Rt Hon Margaret Thatcher MPPrime MinisterIon William Whitelaw MPiy of State for the Home DepartmentHon Lord Carrington(y of State for Foreign andjwealth Affairs^fon Sir Keith Joseph MPof State for IndustryHlon Lord Soamesisident of the CouncilIon Peter Walker MP^1 of Agriculture, Fisheries and Food[on George Younger MPetary of State for Scotlandon Humphrey Atkins MPf of State for Northern Irelandon Norman St John-Stevas MPJr of the Duchy of Lancasteron Mark Carlisle QC MPf of State for Education and ScienceThe Rt Hon Lord HailshamLord ChancellorThe Rt Hon Sir Geoffrey Howe QC MPChancellor of the ExchequerThe Rt Hon Francis Pym MPSecretary of State for DefenceThe Rt Hon James Prior MPSecretary of State for EmploymentThe Rt Hon Michael Heseltine MPSecretary of State for the EnvironmentThe Rt Hon Nicholas Edwards MPSecretary of State for WalesThe Rt Hon Patrick Jenkin MPSecretary of State for Social ServicesThe Rt Hon David Ho well MPSecretary of State for EnergyThe Rt Hon John Biffen MPChief Secretary, TreasuryThe Rt Hon Angus Maude MPPaymaster GeneraliCONFIDENTIAL CONFIDENTIALTHE FOLLOWING WERE ALSO PRESENTNorman Fowler MP The Rt Hon Michael Jopling MPf Transport Parliamentary Secretary, TreasurySECRETARYSir John HuntSUBJECTTHE BUDGETiiCONFIDENTIAL CONFIDENTIALTHE CHANCELLOR OF THE EXCHEQUER informed the Cabinet ofthe proposals in his forthcoming Budget.In accordance with precedent details are not recorded in theCabinet Conclusions.Cabinet Office12 June 1979CONFIDENTIAL
